The Institute for Industrial Technology (IIT) bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ọrụ aka na Lagos, Nigeria
IIT malitere ọrụ na afọ 2000, na ebumnuche nke inye agụmakwụkwọ dabere na ụkpụrụ na ọzụzụ ọrụ aka na ndị ntorobịa nwoke si n'ezinụlọ nwere obere ihe onwunwe.
IIT nwere ihe nlereanya agụmakwụkwọ dabere na Dual Training System, nke jikọtara ọzụzụ na IIT na ụlọ ọrụ mmekọrịta n'ime mmemme ahụ.
Institute for Industrial Technology na-enye ọtụtụ ọmụmụ maka ndị na-ahapụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ndị ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ
Ndị a gụnyere electromechanics, mechatronics, na electrotechnics.
